activities: MedPoint Digital collects personal data of invitees and participants in clinical trials and professional medical education programs including Health Care Professionals, employees of sponsoring companies and their agents and affiliates.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, address, phone, email, institution, title and project specific data including surveys.  Data is collected automatically on-line and off-line for the purposes of conducting professional education or clinical studies.
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: BBB EU Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure.
